name: boise
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital and the largest city of the US state of Idaho: Homeless and disadvantaged people in Boise have more places to go and more services available than ever before. Several Boise hospitals have signs written in Bosnian and interpreter services.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Boise.He spent five years working as a nurse in Boise.Most of them lived in Boise, and most have passed away now.What does the future hold for Boise?His report begins on the outskirts of Boise, a hundred miles from one of the biggest fires.
